attributes.action: Support and Enforce the UK Asbestos Register; Together we will Save Lives!
attributes.additional_details:
5000 people die each year from Asbestos related diseases - www.hse.gov.uk/statistics/overall/hssh1415.pdf

Any non-domestic Building built before 2000 needs an Asbestos Register, it's the LAW. 
Reg 4 of CAR 2012

Non compliance: fine up to £20,000, imprisonment up to 12 months. Serious breach: unlimited fine &/or imprisonment up to 2 years. 
www.gov.uk

75% of Britain's schools contain Asbestos 
http://www.juac.org.uk/factsheets-tools-information/appg-asbestos-in-schools-the-need-for-action/
attributes.background: Asbestos Surveyors will Lodge Asbestos Reports & Registers; anyone will then download it to Know the Dangers Instantly. This will allow for better planning, safer working & use of safety controls. 5000 people die in the UK of Asbestos related diseases each year, twice the amount killed on our roads.
